room_title: Escape room "The Castle of Loches" by The Tower Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Tower escapes has some fun escape rooms, I've done 2 of the three rooms available and they were very fun, a little linear, but still a ton of fun. The atmosphere is great, the tower is really fun and the architecture was used very effectively. They use a lot of technology in their escapes too, which is a lot of fun.
